item.title: Delta is launching Delta Innovation Classes
item.description:
Delta Air Lines has devised a novel method for premium customers to distinguish themselves and share contact information, using a compelling offer.
As stated on the Delta Innovation Class website, the airline is offering a “mentoring program â€“ that just so happens to take place at 35,000 feet.”
This program, Delta Innovation Class, a play on flight classes, gives one fortunate customer a complimentary seat next to a notable figure or celebrity on a designated flight...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/delta-is-launching-delta-innovation-classes/
